website_summaries.verdict: Cute basic slow cooker. Will cook everything from soup to full meals. Good for families of two to four people.
pros: Nice addition to a kitchen with its appealing design
Doesn't take up much counter space
Good during summer so you don't have to heat up your kitchen stove
cons: Exterior may get hot, and exterior finish may be hard to maintain and keep clean
Only has three heating options, and no clips to keep lid on unit

customer_reviews.title: I have bought this last year in April, I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this last year in April, I see the pot is developing cracks. How does the warranty work? I see that it has 2 year manufacture warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s version good, I made a good soup with it.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely, positively, a solid buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this and its inaugural run was this evening- I made short ribs. Turned out fantastic- evenly heats, super flavorful- chic and cute looking on my counter. Home run. The lid was a cause for concern when I opened this up because of the lack of rubber siding but it did a beautiful job and kept the heat in. I definitely recommend Black + Decker slow cookers!!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Kettle called me Purple
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my daughter, this was her first crockpot for her first home. She is in LOVE with the color purple and it was a hit when she opened it. Now she has started making the crockpot recipes that I made for her and her brother and sister. From what she tells me, it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Rimkus

customer_reviews.title: The first 2 did not work because of poor fit and could not seal in heat
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING!!! This is replacement number 2! The first 2 did not work because of poor fit and could not seal in heat. this one fits OK, but I've had my beans cooking for 7 hours....AND THEYRE STILL NOT DONE!!! I GIVE UP! I wanted to buy from a USA company, but these are made in Mexico or Canada anyway, SO SCREW IT! 3 lemons in a row? TRASH!!!
customer_reviews.author: silicone test pilot

customer_reviews.title: Cute and adequate
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a very small crockpot so I purchased this one. It arrived with a small flaw in the ceramic paint but it was on the outer lip so it did not affect the performance and I opted not to return it. I used it with a liner all the time so it's pristine and now my family has grown so I have a very large one! I am probably going to donate this to charity.
customer_reviews.author: B. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works well
customer_reviews.text: Nice slow cooker. I am usually quite leary of Black and Decker products and typically avoid them. The pattern on this cooker caught my wife's eye and it became a Birthday present. So far has worked great and is easy to clean, time will tell for reliability. You wouldn't want to go any smaller for a family of four, but for four or less this is a good size.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: This is small enough to stay out on the counter even though we have a smaller kitchen. It is large enough to cook meat for our family of 5. I love that it is dishwasher safe! Another plus is that the pattern and color on the outside is pretty. It adds a pop of color to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: A great crockpot!!
customer_reviews.text: This crockpot is awesome! It heats so much better than my previous one that recently quit working. Black and Decker products are really great and I would highly recommend this product to anyone who has space limitations in their kitchen like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Osgood

customer_reviews.title: Slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook with this little guy, perform better than my big one. Its so easy to clean and after many uses now still looks like new. Would recomment and def. buy again
customer_reviews.author: Claudia C.

customer_reviews.title: For My Wife
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my kitchen. Right size for empty nesters!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Copen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is used as a smaller secondary slow cooker for sauces/ dips and smaller appetizer type foods. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christie G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love this slow cooker, the size is good and it has warm setting which is why I ordered it to replace one that didn't.
customer_reviews.author: CamLWood

customer_reviews.title: But it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still looking for a Slow Cooker Cookbook. I haven't used it yet. But it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Teresita Cajucom

customer_reviews.title: Hip Little Crock Pot
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this crockpot. It's the perfect size for our empty nest household. The color of purple/gray is great and modern twist on a standard crock pot. Already make bbq beef sandwiches, chicken tacos and am looking forward to years of use out this one. Update: Third use there was some baked on stuff on the outside of the crock after using. Didn't think much of it. Used it today and when I removed the pot...there was about 1" of liquid in the base that had seeped thru the crock somehow. VERY DISAPPOINTED in the product and have never had this happen with any of my other slow cookers. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestIrishMom

customer_reviews.title: This crockpot is horrible it's so cheaply made I'm afraid to leave it ...
customer_reviews.text: This crockpot is horrible it's so cheaply made I'm afraid to leave it plugged in and the glaze I would not trust with my food . off to the workshop it goes to well melt wax
customer_reviews.author: Jon l

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: all ok so far. Have no taste seat cover yet
customer_reviews.author: nana n

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER SC2004D 4 Quart Dial Control Slow Cooker with Built in Lid Holder, Purple Pulse
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue Pattern

See how easy delicious meals can be with the BLACK+DECKER 4-Quart Slow Cooker. For roasts, soups, chili, and so much more, just place the ingredients in the 4-quart stoneware crock and let the constant heat go to work. Three heat settings give you options to find the best temperature for your recipe and your schedule—low for 8-9 hours of cooking, high for 3-4 hours, and warm for keeping food at the ideal serving temperature. Plus, this slow cooker is easy to clean thanks to the dishwasher-safe stoneware crock and tempered glass lid. And the fresh design of the durable metal exterior adds a modern touch to your kitchen. Recipes Included, discover a new slow cooker favorite with easy meal solutions inside.

Seller Warranty Description
2 year limited warranty
feature_bullets: Three Heat Settings - Low, high, and warm settings for ideal slow cooker performance with every recipe.
Built-In Lid Holder - Keep countertops clean and stir & serve without holding the lid! The built-in holder props the lid conveniently on either of the side handles.
Removable Stoneware Crock - The durable 4-quart crock retains heat and is easy to clean.
4 Quarts - Make a hot meal for the whole family with room for over 5 servings.
Dishwasher-Safe Parts - Cleanup is a breeze with the dishwasher-safe crock and lid. Tempered Glass Lid - Keep an eye on your food while it cooks without lifting the lid.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
